titleInfo.title: Grand Ole Opry - American Ace / Royal Crown Cola - 1948-01-10 - Excerpts

mods.abstract: Excerpts from American Ace and Royal Crown Cola sponsored Grand Ole Opry segments (7:30-8:00 pm, 9:00-9:30 pm, respectively) from January 10, 1948. Featuring Roy Acuff and his Smoky Mountain Boys. Held at Ryman Auditorium, Nashville, TN.

recordInfo.recordContentSource: Country Music Hall of Fame and Museum
